attributes.action: Declare a National Holiday and arrange events to celebrate the 300 years of union between England and Scotland on the 1st May 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that the 300th year of celebration of the United Kingdom is being ignored by the Government and I think that we should in some way mark this very succesful union by celebrating all that we have given each other over the last 300 years.
